![San Saba logo](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/cropped-Logo-CITY-SS-2017-Cap-Pecan-Capital-1-1-1.png)




The City of San Saba is proud to be guided by a variety of boards and commissions, each dedicated to enhancing the quality of life for our residents and shaping the future of our community. These boards and commissions are comprised of passionate citizens and community leaders who volunteer their time and expertise to address important issues, offer recommendations, and oversee programs that support the city’s vision.

![](https://sansabatexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/council-chambers-1-1024x634.jpg)

From fostering economic growth to beautifying our public spaces, each board or commission plays a vital role in advancing specific initiatives that benefit San Saba. Whether it’s planning for future development, maintaining essential services like utilities and streets, or creating vibrant recreational opportunities in our parks, these groups work diligently to ensure our city continues to thrive.

* [Keep San Saba Beautiful](https://sansabatexas.com/boards-commissions/keep-san-saba-beautiful/)
